backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue structures, activities, moments, and save/load logic per caller.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise descriptions of key frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed Internet Computer deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the root div and main TypeScript module.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide on keeping the canister running and handling availability issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing screens, startup, backend access, game launching, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Config for local admin gate with username constant and derived storage key.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activities with trust effects and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand-powered audio manager that initializes background music, handles volume/mute state, and exposes controls.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: 3D Puro character component with idle animation and interaction behavior to open dialogue on click.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Touch control overlay implementing joystick, look controls, and jump button for mobile devices.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard and mobile inputs into unified movement/look state and handles jump requests.
Zustand store storing joystick, look deltas, and jump flags with setters and reset logic.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Defines customization items with placement options for decorating the environment.
Dialogue tree defining conversation nodes, choices, trust effects, and branching paths.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view that initializes state, renders the 3D scene, handles audio, and toggles UI panels such as dialogue, activities, and pause menus.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates contextual letter responses based on keywords, choosing from friendly, curious, or encouraging presets.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: A book-sorting minigame where players categorize books to earn trust, with UI and drag/drop handling logic.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A drawing-viewing minigame letting players flip through Puro's drawings and gain trust for viewing all.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek minigame where players guess Puro's hiding spot and earn trust based on speed.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: A launcher that displays a menu and loads one of several minigames, resetting on completion or close.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Renders a selected story moment with its scene text and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data entries including titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Three.js-based library scene handling player movement, jumping physics, camera tracking, and environment setup.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store for game state, including trust, dialogue, activities, customization, letters, endings, and UI flags with related update actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines available endings with trust thresholds and provides a helper to select the correct ending based on trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending based on trust level, unlocks it, and provides options to restart or return to the title screen.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Shows available activities, updates trust and activity completion, unlocks moments, and closes the menu after selection.
Allows placing discovered customization items in the library and displays both placed and available items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Renders dialogue nodes with choices that adjust trust and progress through the dialogue tree or close the panel.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Provides UI for writing letters, sending them to receive generated responses, and viewing the inbox.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of unlockable story moments and plays a selected moment when chosen.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides pause screen options including resuming, navigation to submenus, settings, and admin terminal access.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders audio settings with mute and volume controls and a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows the player's trust level with a label, color indicator, and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health using the actor and exposes status, errors, and a refetch method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend game operations with React Query hooks for fetching state and performing mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one‑time app startup, asset preloading, storage checks, and exposes reset for tests.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store managing a simple persisted admin unlock gate using a fixed username.
Zustand store that persists a toggle for enabling or disabling server access.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI card that lets users unlock or lock local admin mode and shows status feedback.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Credits view showing game info, features, and a back button with background art.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin‑only diagnostic terminal overlay supporting command input and auto‑scrolling output.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays startup or launch errors with optional technical details and retry/back actions.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: A React error boundary that catches runtime errors during game rendering and shows a styled fallback with optional technical details and a return-to-title button.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Displays server availability using text and icons based on backend health and local server-access settings.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements terminal command parsing and execution for diagnostics and local server-access control.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic state into human‑readable text lines for terminal output.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility, output lines, and input/output logging.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the main title screen with game actions, admin controls, server access toggle, and status indicator.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into user‑friendly summaries and categorized error types.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation of the frontend startup flow and how initialization tasks execute.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architectural notes, issues, and existing features for a 3D mobile-friendly visual-novel/adventure game. Contains design constraints, backend IC canister requirements, admin gating rules, and known build/runtime errors.
